source.author: Jeanes, J.A.
source.title: Boraginaceae
source.in_title: Flora of Victoria. Vol. 4. Cornaceae to Asteraceae
source.citation: From: Jeanes, J.A. (1999). Boraginaceae. In: Walsh, N.G.; Entwisle, T.J. (eds), Flora of Victoria. Vol. 4. Cornaceae to Asteraceae. Inkata Press, Melbourne.

leads.lead_text: Leaves white-woolly on undersides, entire; hairs simple; calyx-lobes unequal
Leaves green on both sides, usually with 3 apical teeth and occasionally a few marginal teeth; indumentum a mixture of appressed centrifixed hairs and glandular hairs; calyx-lobes equal
